name: Buddy and Bro
description:
Buddy and Bro is a single player, platformer using 2 characters that need to cooperate with each other to solve the puzzles. There are 5 levels.

Best played with controller

Xbox Controller
Left and Right to move
A to Jump
A to Interact
X to switch characters
Buddy can Jump
Bro can push blocks

Keyboard
A and D to move
Space Bar to Jump
Space Bar to Interact
E to switch characters
Buddy can Jump
Bro can push blocks
